stripped_text: The first time each turn a program or a piece of hardware is trashed (from any location), you may place 1 power counter on District 99. click, 3 hosted power counters: Add a card that matches the faction of your identity from your heap to your grip.
text: The first time each turn a program or a piece of hardware is trashed (from any location), you may place 1 power counter on District 99. [click], 3 hosted power counters: Add a card that matches the faction of your identity from your heap to your grip.
title: District 99
